content.rendered:
Capio Specialistkliniker has acquired all shares in Derma Cure Sverige AB, which is operating SKIN Hudkliniken at Carlanderska in Gothenburg. SKIN Hudkliniken is a specialist clinic that provides medical skin care and offers diagnosis and treatment of skin diseases such as eczema, acne, skin tumours, rosacea, psoriasis and fungal skin diseases to both insured and private pay patients. The acquisition strengthens Capio’s care offering within specialist medical practice in western Sweden.

Capio, which is a part of the Ramsay Santé Group, is a leading healthcare provider in the Nordics, offering services within medicine, surgery, and psychiatry through its hospitals, specialist clinics, and primary care centers, in 14 regions in Sweden and with presence in Norway and Denmark. Capio has a long-term commitment to lead the efforts for improved healthcare and to better serve the needs of regions and their patients in a rapidly changing healthcare landscape.

Capio was advised by Mannheimer Swartling in the transaction.
